item.title: 从"买美国货"到"再见美国"，华尔街出逃潮加速蔓延
item.description: 美国投资者正以至少16年来最快的速度撤出本国股市资金，因科技巨头回报率下滑，而表现更佳的海外市场显得更具吸引力。【原文：U.S. investors are pulling money out of their own stock market at the fastest pace in at least 16 years as Big Tech returns fade and better-performing overseas markets look more attractive.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，OpenAI正在开发包括智能音箱在内的人工智能设备。
item.description: 据《信息报》周五援引知情人士报道，OpenAI正投入逾200人研发一系列人工智能设备，产品线将包含智能音箱，可能还包括智能眼镜和智能灯具。【原文：OpenAI has more than 200 people working on a family of AI-powered devices that will include a smart speaker and possibly smart glasses and a smart lamp, the Information reported on Friday, citing a person with knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回特朗普的全球关税案
item.description: 美国最高法院周五推翻了特朗普总统依据国家紧急状态法实施的广泛关税措施，驳回了其最具争议的权力主张之一。该裁决对全球经济产生重大影响。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court struck down on Friday President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs that he pursued under a law meant for use in national emergencies, rejecting one of his most contentious assertions of his authority in a ruling with major implications for the global economy.】

item.title: 联邦监管机构批评联邦航空管理局对美联航维修操作的监管不力
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局对美联航维护操作的监管因人员短缺、员工培训不力以及获取航空公司数据的障碍而受阻，联邦监管机构周五表示。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration's oversight of United Airlines’ maintenance practices is hindered by low staffing, ineffective workforce training and hurdles to accessing air carrier data, a federal watchdog said Friday.】

item.title: 标普全球称美国2月商业活动增速放缓
item.description: 美国一项调查显示，2月份美国商业活动扩张速度创10个月来最低水平，工厂订单减少，服务业新业务增长放缓，就业增长全面停滞。【原文：U.S. business activity expanded in February at the slowest rate in 10 months as orders receded at factories, new business growth slackened for services firms and employment growth stalled across the board, a survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 美国法官维持对特斯拉自动驾驶致死事故的2.43亿美元判决
item.description: 联邦法官驳回了特斯拉支付2.43亿美元赔偿金的请求，该赔偿金本拟用于补偿2019年一起致命车祸的受害者——该事故涉及一辆配备自动驾驶功能的Model S车型。【原文：A federal judge rejected Tesla's request to pay $243 million to victims of a 2019 fatal crash of an Autopilot-equipped Model S.】

item.title: 纽柯钢铁公司任命内部人士杰克·沙利文为首席财务官
item.description: 美国钢铁制造商纽柯公司周五宣布，任命内部人士杰克·沙利文为新任首席财务官，任命将于3月1日生效。【原文：U.S. steelmaker Nucor said on Friday it has appointed insider Jack Sullivan as its new finance chief, effective March 1.】

item.title: 玩具制造商Funko在投资者Pleasant Lake的推动下，正探索战略选择。
item.description: 根据周四提交的监管文件显示，愉悦湖合伙公司披露其持有玩具制造商Funko约10%的股权，并表示该公司应考虑包括出售在内的战略选择方案。【原文：Pleasant Lake Partners disclosed a roughly 10% stake in toymaker Funko and said the company should consider strategic alternatives, including the possibility of a sale, according to a regulatory filing from Thursday.】

item.title: 美国个人消费支出通胀在12月升温
item.description: 种种迹象表明，1月份经济增长将进一步加速，这将强化市场预期——美联储在6月之前不会降息。【原文：Signs are pointing to a further acceleration in January, which would strengthen expectations that the Federal Reserve would not cut interest rates before June.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所新私募股权交易平台首笔交易启动
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所周五启动了英国金融监管机构新推出的PISCES框架下的首笔交易，该框架允许投资者买卖私营公司股票。【原文：London Stock Exchange on Friday launched its first transaction under the UK financial regulator's new PISCES framework that allows investors to trade shares in private companies.】

item.title: 美国第四季度经济增速大幅放缓
item.description: 美国商务部表示，上季度国内生产总值按年率计算增长1.4%。路透社调查的经济学家此前预测GDP增速为3%。【原文：Gross domestic product increased at a 1.4% annualized rate last quarter, said the Commerce Department. Economists polled by Reuters had forecast GDP rising at a 3% pace.】

item.title: 蓝猫股价再度下跌，投资者消化债务基金调整影响
item.description: 蓝猫资本周五盘前交易中股价下跌约4%，延续了前一交易日的跌势。此前这家另类资产管理公司公布了最新计划，拟从一只小型债务基金中返还资本，该消息令投资者惊慌，并拖累同行股价下挫。【原文：Blue Owl Capital shares fell about 4% in pre-market trading on Friday, extending the previous session's slide, after the alternative asset manager unveiled its latest plan to return capital from a small debt fund that spooked investors and dragged peers lower.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易专员称，尽管面临阻力，欧盟仍应准备好实施与南方共同市场的协议
item.description: 欧盟贸易专员马罗什·谢夫乔维奇周五表示，尽管法国反对且面临法律挑战，欧盟仍应准备在未来数月内启动其与南美洲南方共同市场集团的争议性自由贸易协定。【原文：The European Union should be ready to put into force its contentious free trade agreement with South America's Mercosur bloc in the coming months despite opposition from France and a legal challenge, EU trade chief Maros Sefcovic said on Friday.】

item.title: 利安德巴塞尔大幅削减季度股息
item.description: 石化巨头利安德巴塞尔公司周五宣布削减第一季度股息，称这是化工行业遭遇的最长期低迷之一。【原文：Petrochemical maker LyondellBasell cut its first-quarter dividend on Friday, citing one of the longest downturns in the chemicals industry.】

item.title: 美国股市期货在经济数据公布前表现平淡
item.description: 美国股市期货周五持平，投资者正等待关键经济数据以判断今年货币政策宽松的走向，同时密切关注与德黑兰的紧张局势以及美国最高法院对特朗普关税政策的潜在裁决。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were flat on Friday as investors awaited key economic data to gauge the path of monetary policy easing for the year while monitoring tensions with Tehran and a potential U.S. Supreme Court decision on Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：原油被吞没
item.description: 迈克·多兰和ROI团队本周末最期待阅读、观看和收听的内容。【原文：Everything Mike Dolan and the ROI team are excited to read, watch and listen to over the weekend.】

item.title: 全球股票基金吸引五周来最大资金流入，因人工智能相关担忧缓解
item.description: 截至2月18日的七天内，全球股票基金迎来五周来最强劲的资金流入。人工智能股票担忧情绪缓解，投资者转向其他板块支撑了需求，而美联储降息预期重燃提振了市场对美国经济增长的信心。【原文：Global equity funds received their strongest inflows in five weeks in the seven days to February 18, as easing concerns over artificial intelligence stocks and investor rotation into other sectors supported demand, while renewed hopes for Federal Reserve rate cuts lifted sentiment toward U.S. growth.】

item.title: 印尼-美国贸易协定要点
item.description: 印度尼西亚与美国周四敲定了一项贸易协议，将美国对东南亚最大经济体出口商品的关税从32%降至19%，此前双方进行了近一年的谈判。【原文：Indonesia and the United States finalised a trade deal on Thursday that cut U.S. levies to 19% from 32% on goods shipped from Southeast Asia's biggest economy, following nearly a year of negotiations.】

item.title: 华尔街本周展望：英伟达与软件公司财报将考验人工智能相关股票市场
item.description: 投资者下周将关注人工智能行业风向标英伟达公司的财报，以稳定因人工智能相关担忧而动荡的美国股市。【原文：Investors turn to financial results from artificial intelligence bellwether Nvidia Corp in the coming week to steady a U.S. stock market that has been rocked by AI-related worries.】

item.title: 美国国防工业新出台的网络安全规定为部分小型供应商设置了障碍
item.description: 美国针对国防领域出台的新网络安全法规，正迫使部分小型供应商重新考虑承接军工业务，因其合规成本过高。值此特朗普政府施压承包商提升产量并实现供应多元化的时期，此举正加剧生产风险。【原文：New U.S. cybersecurity rules for the defense sector are leading some small suppliers to rethink military work due to high compliance costs, raising production risks at a time when the Trump administration is pressuring contractors to boost output and diversify the supply base.】

item.title: 独家：宾夕法尼亚大学沃顿商学院估算，最高法院裁决可能危及美国逾1750亿美元关税收入
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚大学沃顿商学院预算模型经济学家周五表示，若美国最高法院对特朗普总统广泛实施的紧急关税作出不利裁决，美国可能面临退还逾1750亿美元关税收入的风险。【原文：More than $175 billion in U.S. tariff collections are at risk of having to be refunded if the U.S. Supreme Court rules against President Donald Trump's broad emergency tariffs, Penn-Wharton Budget Model economists said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国股票基金创五周来最大单周资金流入
item.description: 截至2月18日当周，美国股票基金迎来大量资金流入。此前消费者价格通胀报告显示升温放缓，提振市场对美联储降息的预期，缓解了科技板块抛售的担忧。【原文：U.S. equity funds saw a substantial inflow of capital in the week to February 18 on easing worries over a selloff in the technology sector after a cooler consumer price inflation report boosted expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 秘鲁政局更迭频仍，市场却基本未受影响
item.description: 秘鲁总统职位本周再度更迭，不到十年间该国已迎来第七位领导人。然而政治动荡并未引发市场剧烈波动，投资者似乎对此习以为常。【原文：Peru’s revolving-door presidency turned again this week, ushering out the country's seventh leader in less than a decade, but the political churn has produced little market turbulence as investors seem unfazed by the spin.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，特朗普盟友与俄罗斯诺瓦泰克公司就阿拉斯加天然气项目达成合作
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周五报道，与美国总统特朗普家族有联系的美国金融家詹特里·比奇去年秋季与俄罗斯能源巨头诺瓦泰克公司签署协议，在西方对俄实施制裁之际开发阿拉斯加天然气项目。【原文：American financier Gentry Beach, who has ties to U.S. President Donald Trump's family, signed an agreement with Russia’s energy giant Novatek last autumn to develop natural gas in Alaska amid Western sanctions against Russia, the New York Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 美国驻印度大使称，美方正就委内瑞拉石油销售事宜与印度进行谈判
item.description: 美国特使塞尔吉奥·戈尔周五表示，美国正就向印度出售委内瑞拉石油进行"积极谈判"，以帮助印度实现原油来源多元化。【原文：The United States is in "active negotiation" over the sale of Venezuelan oil to India, to help India diversify its sources of crude oil, U.S. Envoy Sergio Gor said on Friday.】

item.title: 食品巨头达能对2026年前景充满信心，此前中国市场推动2025年销售额超预期增长
item.description: 法国食品集团达能表示，在2025年销售额和现金流超出分析师预期后，公司正以信心开启2026年。得益于中国婴幼儿食品需求强劲，加上成本削减措施提升了利润率。【原文：French food group Danone said it was starting 2026 with confidence after it delivered 2025 sales and cash above analysts' expectations, helped by baby food demand in China, and improved its profit margin thanks to cost cuts.】

item.title: 独家：乌克兰2026年国防出口额或达"数十亿美元"，官员称
item.description: 乌克兰国防部高级官员表示，该国今年可能出口价值数十亿美元的军用物资和服务，此前乌克兰首次批准了战时对外军售，并正考虑对这些出口征收关税。【原文：Ukraine could export several billion dollars of military goods and services this year after authorising its first wartime foreign sales and is considering introducing a tax on those exports, a senior Ukrainian defence official said.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对伊朗动武
item.description: 汤姆·韦斯特布鲁克带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老基金UniSuper表示本币被低估，增加对冲操作
item.description: 澳大利亚最大养老基金之一UniSuper已加大海外投资的对冲力度，该机构表示澳元被低估，随着澳美利差扩大，澳元汇率将走高。【原文：One of Australia's largest pension funds, UniSuper, has increased hedging of its overseas investments as it says the local currency is undervalued and will rise as the interest rate differential between Australia and the U.S. widens.】

item.title: 《金融时报》称亚马逊云服务部门遭遇至少两次涉及人工智能工具的故障
item.description: 《金融时报》周五援引知情人士报道称，亚马逊云计算部门因其人工智能工具出现故障，已遭遇至少两次服务中断。【原文：Amazon's cloud unit has suffered at least two outages stemming from errors involving its own AI tools, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
